page.title: 07MOTHER MAY I
page.content: The game "Mother May I" needs eight people, seven will be the days of the week and the last one is a caller. The caller tells the players what movements to make. The movements are: Giant Steps which are the biggest steps possibly managed, Fairy Steps which makes the heel touch the toe. Ladder is when one person lies on the floor. Another is called Umbrella when a player twirls around and heads towards the caller until 'stop' is called. Trip to London and Back Again is when a weekday runs or walks depending on whether the caller says fast or slow, then a weekday runs from a place round the caller and keeps running until the caller says stop. The object of the game is to reach the caller before anybody else in order to become caller in the next game.
